name: Helminth Ferocity
description: Allows the Kubrow to use Finisher attacks on an enemy.
Erlaubt es dem Kubrow, Todesstöße gegen Gegner auszuführen.
languages.name: Helminth Bösartigkeit

description: Autorise le Kubrow à utiliser un Coup de Grâce sur un ennemi
languages.name: Férocité de Helminth

description: Permette al Kubrow di effettuare Esecuzioni sui nemici.
languages.name: Helminth Ferocity

description: 쿠브로가 적에게 마무리 일격을 가할 수 있게 됩니다.
languages.name: 헬민스 페로시티

description: Permite al kubrow usar ataques de remate en un enemigo.
languages.name: Ferocidad Helminto

description: 让库狛能对敌人使出处决攻击。
languages.name: Helminth 凶恶终结

description: Позволяет кубрау использовать добивающие приемы на врагах.
languages.name: Гельминтова свирепость

description: クブロウが敵に対しフィニッシャー攻撃を仕掛ける。
languages.name: Helminth Ferocity

description: Pozwala Kubrowowi na wykonywanie ataków kończących na ofierze.
languages.name: Brutalność Helmintha

description: Permite que o Kubrow realize finalizações em um inimigo.
languages.name: Helminth Ferocity

description: 讓庫狛能對敵人使出終結攻擊。
languages.name: Helminth 兇惡終結

description: ทำให้ Kubrow สามารถใช้ฟินิชเชอร์โจมตีศัตรูได้
languages.name: Helminth Ferocity

description: Kubrow'un düşmanlar üzerinde Bitirici ataklar yapmasını sağlar.
languages.name: Helminth Ferocity
